title: Quantitative Risk Assessment
description: An analyst must perform a quantitative risk assessment for a potential data breach, calculating the potential financial loss.

tasks.description: Determine the value of the asset at risk (e.g., a customer database with 1 million records).
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly identifies the asset and its size.

tasks.description: Estimate the likelihood of a data breach occurring in a given year based on historical data and threat intelligence.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst estimates a 10% chance of a breach per year.

tasks.description: Calculate the Annualized Loss Expectancy (ALE) by multiplying the potential loss per breach (e.g., $5M) by the likelihood (10%), to arrive at an ALE of $500,000.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly performs the quantitative risk calculation to inform security investment decisions.
